text: Mariam Vladislavovna Aghababjan (born 1964) is an Armenian botanist, plant taxonomist, employee of the Institute of Botany of the National Academy of Sciences of Armenia. She described many species of the genus Rhaponticoides, which was isolated from the genus Centaurea. In 1992, under the leadership of Armen Takhtajan, she defended her thesis on the topic “Typical subgenus Centaurea” . She described for science 48 species of plants. This author is usually abbreviated «M.V.Agab.» when citing a botanical name. ==Works== Centaurea tamanianae M. V. Agab. in Biol. Zurn.
